mainEvents.title: Birth of Jesus
mainEvents.text: She will give birth to a son, and you are to give him the name Jesus.
mainEvents.textTe: She will give birth to a son, and you are to give him the name Jesus.

mainEvents.title: Sermon on the Mount
mainEvents.text: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
mainEvents.textTe: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

mainEvents.title: Crucifixion and Resurrection
mainEvents.text: He is not here; he has risen, just as he said.
mainEvents.textTe: He is not here; he has risen, just as he said.

mainEvents.title: John the Baptist Prepares the Way
mainEvents.text: John appeared, baptizing in the wilderness and proclaiming a baptism of repentance.
mainEvents.titleTe: John the Baptist Prepares the Way
mainEvents.textTe: John appeared, baptizing in the wilderness and proclaiming a baptism of repentance.

mainEvents.title: Miracles of Jesus
mainEvents.text: He took her by the hand and said to her, 'Talitha koum!'
mainEvents.textTe: He took her by the hand and said to her, 'Talitha koum!'

mainEvents.title: The Last Supper
mainEvents.text: Take it; this is my body.
mainEvents.textTe: Take it; this is my body.

mainEvents.title: Birth of John the Baptist
mainEvents.text: Your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son, and you are to call him John.
mainEvents.textTe: Your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son, and you are to call him John.

mainEvents.title: Parable of the Good Samaritan
mainEvents.text: A Samaritan, as he traveled, came where the man was; and when he saw him, he took pity on him.
mainEvents.textTe: A Samaritan, as he traveled, came where the man was; and when he saw him, he took pity on him.

mainEvents.title: Ascension of Jesus
mainEvents.text: While he was blessing them, he left them and was taken up into heaven.
mainEvents.textTe: While he was blessing them, he left them and was taken up into heaven.

mainEvents.title: Wedding at Cana
mainEvents.text: He thus revealed his glory, and his disciples believed in him.
mainEvents.textTe: He thus revealed his glory, and his disciples believed in him.

mainEvents.title: Raising of Lazarus
mainEvents.text: Jesus called in a loud voice, 'Lazarus, come out!'
mainEvents.textTe: Jesus called in a loud voice, 'Lazarus, come out!'

mainEvents.title: Jesus Appears to Thomas
mainEvents.text: Stop doubting and believe.
mainEvents.textTe: Stop doubting and believe.

mainEvents.title: Pentecost
mainEvents.text: All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues.
mainEvents.textTe: All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues.

mainEvents.title: Peter's Sermon
mainEvents.text: Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ.
mainEvents.textTe: Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ.

mainEvents.title: Paul's Conversion
mainEvents.text: Saul, Saul, why do you persecute me?... Now get up and go into the city.
mainEvents.textTe: Saul, Saul, why do you persecute me?... Now get up and go into the city.

mainEvents.title: Justification by Faith
mainEvents.text: For we maintain that a person is justified by faith apart from the works of the law.
mainEvents.textTe: For we maintain that a person is justified by faith apart from the works of the law.

mainEvents.title: Life in the Spirit
mainEvents.text: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
mainEvents.textTe: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

mainEvents.title: Unity in the Church
mainEvents.text: I appeal to you, brothers and sisters, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that all of you agree with one another.
mainEvents.textTe: I appeal to you, brothers and sisters, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that all of you agree with one another.

mainEvents.title: Love Chapter
mainEvents.text: Love is patient, love is kind...
mainEvents.textTe: Love is patient, love is kind...

mainEvents.title: Ministry of Reconciliation
mainEvents.text: God reconciled us to himself through Christ and gave us the ministry of reconciliation.
mainEvents.textTe: God reconciled us to himself through Christ and gave us the ministry of reconciliation.

mainEvents.title: Paul's Suffering
mainEvents.text: Five times I received from the Jews the forty lashes minus one...
mainEvents.textTe: Five times I received from the Jews the forty lashes minus one...

mainEvents.title: Fruit of the Spirit
mainEvents.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
mainEvents.textTe: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.

mainEvents.title: Freedom in Christ
mainEvents.text: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.
mainEvents.textTe: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.

mainEvents.title: Spiritual Blessings in Christ
mainEvents.text: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms.
mainEvents.textTe: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms.

mainEvents.title: Unity of the Body
mainEvents.text: There is one body and one Spirit, just as you were called to one hope.
mainEvents.textTe: There is one body and one Spirit, just as you were called to one hope.

mainEvents.title: Joy in Suffering
mainEvents.text: For to me, to live is Christ and to die is gain.
mainEvents.textTe: For to me, to live is Christ and to die is gain.

mainEvents.title: Christ’s Humility
mainEvents.text: Your attitude should be the same as that of Christ Jesus.
mainEvents.textTe: Your attitude should be the same as that of Christ Jesus.

mainEvents.title: Supremacy of Christ
mainEvents.text: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.
mainEvents.textTe: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.

mainEvents.title: Set Your Minds on Things Above
mainEvents.text: Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.
mainEvents.titleTe: Set Your Minds on Things Above
mainEvents.textTe: Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.

mainEvents.title: Encouragement in Persecution
mainEvents.text: You became imitators of us and of the Lord; for you welcomed the message in the midst of severe suffering.
mainEvents.textTe: You became imitators of us and of the Lord; for you welcomed the message in the midst of severe suffering.

mainEvents.title: The Coming of the Lord
mainEvents.text: For the Lord himself will come down from heaven... and so we will be with the Lord forever.
mainEvents.textTe: For the Lord himself will come down from heaven... and so we will be with the Lord forever.

mainEvents.title: Perseverance and Faith
mainEvents.text: We boast about your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and trials you are enduring.
mainEvents.textTe: We boast about your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and trials you are enduring.

mainEvents.title: The Man of Lawlessness
mainEvents.text: Don’t let anyone deceive you in any way, for that day will not come until the rebellion occurs and the man of lawlessness is revealed.
mainEvents.textTe: Don’t let anyone deceive you in any way, for that day will not come until the rebellion occurs and the man of lawlessness is revealed.

mainEvents.title: Instructions for Church Leaders
mainEvents.text: Whoever aspires to be an overseer desires a noble task.
mainEvents.textTe: Whoever aspires to be an overseer desires a noble task.

mainEvents.title: Fight the Good Fight
mainEvents.text: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called.
mainEvents.textTe: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called.

mainEvents.title: Endurance in Ministry
mainEvents.text: Endure hardship with us like a good soldier of Christ Jesus.
mainEvents.textTe: Endure hardship with us like a good soldier of Christ Jesus.

mainEvents.title: Paul’s Final Charge
mainEvents.text: I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.
mainEvents.textTe: I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.

mainEvents.title: Qualifications for Elders
mainEvents.text: An elder must be blameless, faithful to his wife, a man whose children believe.
mainEvents.textTe: An elder must be blameless, faithful to his wife, a man whose children believe.

mainEvents.title: Doing Good Works
mainEvents.text: Those who have trusted in God may be careful to devote themselves to doing what is good.
mainEvents.textTe: Those who have trusted in God may be careful to devote themselves to doing what is good.

mainEvents.title: Paul’s Appeal for Onesimus
mainEvents.text: I appeal to you for my son Onesimus, who became my son while I was in chains.
mainEvents.textTe: I appeal to you for my son Onesimus, who became my son while I was in chains.

mainEvents.title: Superiority of Christ
mainEvents.text: The Son is the radiance of God’s glory and the exact representation of his being.
mainEvents.textTe: The Son is the radiance of God’s glory and the exact representation of his being.

mainEvents.title: Heroes of Faith
mainEvents.text: Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.
mainEvents.textTe: Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.

mainEvents.title: Faith and Works
mainEvents.text: Faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.
mainEvents.textTe: Faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.

mainEvents.title: Taming the Tongue
mainEvents.text: The tongue is a small part of the body, but it makes great boasts.
mainEvents.textTe: The tongue is a small part of the body, but it makes great boasts.

mainEvents.title: Living Hope
mainEvents.text: In his great mercy he has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ.
mainEvents.textTe: In his great mercy he has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

mainEvents.title: Suffering for Doing Good
mainEvents.text: It is better, if it is God’s will, to suffer for doing good than for doing evil.
mainEvents.textTe: It is better, if it is God’s will, to suffer for doing good than for doing evil.

mainEvents.title: Confirm Your Calling
mainEvents.text: Make every effort to confirm your calling and election.
mainEvents.textTe: Make every effort to confirm your calling and election.

mainEvents.title: Day of the Lord
mainEvents.text: The day of the Lord will come like a thief.
mainEvents.textTe: The day of the Lord will come like a thief.

mainEvents.title: Walking in the Light
mainEvents.text: If we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another.
mainEvents.textTe: If we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another.

mainEvents.title: Love One Another
mainEvents.text: Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God.
mainEvents.textTe: Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God.

mainEvents.title: Truth and Love
mainEvents.text: I rejoiced greatly to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as we were commanded by the Father.
mainEvents.textTe: I rejoiced greatly to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as we were commanded by the Father.

mainEvents.title: Walking in Truth
mainEvents.text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.
mainEvents.textTe: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.

mainEvents.title: Contend for the Faith
mainEvents.text: I felt compelled to write and urge you to contend for the faith that was once for all entrusted to God’s holy people.
mainEvents.textTe: I felt compelled to write and urge you to contend for the faith that was once for all entrusted to God’s holy people.

mainEvents.title: Vision of Christ
mainEvents.text: I am the Living One; I was dead, and now look, I am alive for ever and ever!
mainEvents.textTe: I am the Living One; I was dead, and now look, I am alive for ever and ever!

mainEvents.title: The Beast from the Sea
mainEvents.text: And I saw a beast coming out of the sea. It had ten horns and seven heads, with ten crowns on its horns, and on each head a blasphemous name.
mainEvents.textTe: And I saw a beast coming out of the sea. It had ten horns and seven heads, with ten crowns on its horns, and on each head a blasphemous name.

mainEvents.title: The Beast from the Earth
mainEvents.text: Then I saw another beast, coming out of the earth. It had two horns like a lamb, but it spoke like a dragon.
mainEvents.textTe: Then I saw another beast, coming out of the earth. It had two horns like a lamb, but it spoke like a dragon.

mainEvents.title: The Woman and the Scarlet Beast
mainEvents.text: I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast... The name written on her forehead was a mystery: Babylon the Great, the mother of prostitutes and of the abominations of the earth.
mainEvents.titleTe: The Woman and the Scarlet Beast
mainEvents.textTe: I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet beast... The name written on her forehead was a mystery: Babylon the Great, the mother of prostitutes and of the abominations of the earth.

mainEvents.title: The Four Living Creatures
mainEvents.text: In the center, around the throne, were four living creatures... The first was like a lion, the second like an ox, the third had a face like a man, the fourth was like a flying eagle.
mainEvents.textTe: In the center, around the throne, were four living creatures... The first was like a lion, the second like an ox, the third had a face like a man, the fourth was like a flying eagle.

mainEvents.title: New Heaven and New Earth
mainEvents.text: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.
mainEvents.textTe: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.
